footer.footerDescription: President Business Gifts is not just a brand. It is the art of gift giving that reflects attention and prestige. Each product is a symbol of status and respect for detail.

createpage.title: Coming Soon

createpage.returnMessage: Please return to our homepage in the meantime.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: President Business Gifts
about.description: The President Business Gift brand started its journey in 2017 and by 2021 had firmly established itself in the market of exclusive corporate gifts. In just a few years, we have become a reliable partner for companies, government institutions, and private clients who value status, style, and high quality.
about.imageAlt: President Business Gifts is not just a premium gift brand
about.infoText1: Today, President Business Gift is not just a store, but a leader in the field of premium gifts for businessmen and executives. We offer a wide range of exclusive wristwatches, handcrafted leather goods, gift sets with custom engraving, VIP accessories, business notebooks, fountain pens, and souvenirs with a national touch.
about.infoText2: We are rapidly expanding our presence and confidently entering new markets. We do not stop at what we have achieved — each day, the brand 'President Business Gifts' becomes more and more recognizable. Soon, the whole world will know about us.

category.title: Categories
category.unavailable: Unfortunately, this product is currently unavailable. We will add it to the catalog soon. Please check back later.

corporategifts.title: Corporate gifts
corporategifts.text: We also deal with corporate gifts with your logo - watches, leather sets, notebooks, pens and other souvenirs. We have already cooperated with banks, companies and government organizations - we select gifts according to their needs, carry out full branding and packaging
corporategifts.desc: President Business Gifts is not just a product showcase – it's a true immersion into the world of aesthetics, inspiration, and premium gifts. In our showroom, you can personally see exclusive items that combine national heritage and modern design, evaluate their quality, and find the perfect gift for yourself or your partners. If you want to feel the philosophy of our brand – be sure to visit our showroom. You can find the address and location on this page. If you have any questions or want to schedule a meeting in advance – feel free to contact us anytime.
corporategifts.headerText: Corporate gifts with your company logo are not just a formality. They’re a powerful tool for business communication and brand reputation. At President Business Gift, we create gifts that show respect, care, and prestige from your company to executives, partners, and corporate clients.

block1.title: Branded gifts in your company style
block1.subtitle:
• Wristwatches with your logo or emblem
  • Leather goods (wallets, clutches, cardholders, bags) with embossed logos
  • Customized notebooks and engraved pens
  • Gift sets for executives and VIP guests
  • Plaques and souvenirs with national symbols

block2.title: Personalization and custom approach
block2.subtitle: Each gift can be tailored to your corporate identity. We use laser engraving, embossing, and gold foiling technologies. This gives your gift a premium and personal touch. Personalized corporate gifts show special attention to your partners, clients, or employees.

block3.title: When to give corporate gifts?
block3.subtitle:
• On company anniversaries
  • After successful deals
  • On national and public holidays
  • To motivate key clients or employees
  • In honor of promotions, awards, or appointments

block4.title: Why choose President Business Gift?
block4.subtitle:
• Over 8 years of experience in premium B2B gifts
  • Trusted partner for banks, government entities, large corporations
  • Delivery across Central Asia and personal support
  • European production technologies and quality control
  • Gifts that inspire admiration, respect, and trust

catalog.title: Catalog
catalog.description: President Business Gifts is not just a premium gift brand, but a unique blend of national identity and modern aesthetics. Inspired by the historical heritage, cultural richness, and craftsmanship traditions of the Uzbek people, we harmoniously combine them with modern design and the highest standards of quality.
catalog.aboutJournalDesc1: Here you can explore the President Business Gifts magazine!
catalog.aboutJournalDesc2: To do so, swipe the magazine from right to left or click once on the images.
catalog.aboutJournalDesc3: If the magazine images do not appear, please wait a little!
catalog.download: Here you can download all parts of the magazine!

finewatch.maintext:
At President Business Gifts, we don't just create gifts — we create values. Each product goes through a journey from idea to perfect execution under the supervision of our team.
We design everything ourselves, select premium materials, and control every step of production.
finewatch.title: Honoring the Minerva Legacy

craftsmanship.textInfo: Our watches feature precise Japanese and Swiss movements, and for leather goods, we use only selected genuine leather with high durability. Every stitch, engraving, and detail is manually refined so that the final product reflects quality, prestige, and respect.

engineering.description: A mechanism presented to the world
engineering.textInfo: We source parts from trusted suppliers, but all assembly, branding, and packaging is carried out according to our own unique standards. The result is a product that represents your attention and taste.

innovation.textInfo: We apply modern processing, testing, and branding technologies to ensure each item is not only beautiful but also durable. Thanks to precise engineering, integration of new solutions, and design expertise — you receive a product that combines tradition, style, and technology.

shipping.title: Delivery and Shipping
shipping.description: We strive to deliver your order as quickly and conveniently as possible.
shipping.delivery_tashkent_text: Delivery is carried out via Yandex Delivery on the same day the order is placed. You will receive your gift within a few hours after confirmation.
shipping.delivery_regions_text: Orders are shipped via BTS delivery service. Delivery time is from 2 to 7 business days depending on the city and the remoteness of the pickup point.
shipping.contact_text: For all delivery-related questions, you can contact our unified call center:

return.title: Product Warranty
return.text1: We are confident in the quality of our products and provide a warranty for them.
return.text2: Each product with a warranty comes with a warranty card.
return.text3: To receive warranty service, you must keep the warranty card and the receipt.
return.text4: The warranty period ranges from 2 to 5 years, depending on the product type and operating conditions.

appointment.title: Book a visit
appointment.description: Make a preliminary booking to the “President Business Gifts” showroom, and our specialist will contact you to arrange a personal visit at a convenient time for you.

form.reposts: I do not want to receive exclusive offers or product information.

contacts.contactDescription: Need help? You can write to us at any time by filling out the form below. For quicker responses, we also recommend checking the FAQ section, the Product Care Guide, and tracking your order or return status via the link.
contacts.helpTitle: Need help? We are always in touch.
contacts.helpDescription: You can contact us at any time — we will gladly advise you, help you choose a gift or a premium product, place an order, and consult you on delivery.
branchList: Uzbekistan, Tashkent, TSUM, Islam Karimov Street, 17
contacts.formDescription: We are ready to respond to you at any time. Please note that processing your request may take up to 3 working days.

newproducts.title: New Products
newproducts.description: Discover the latest arrivals from President Business Gifts — exclusive items newly added to the collection. Prestigious gifts that emphasize relevance and taste.

servererror.title: 500 Error
servererror.subtitle: We are experiencing a temporary issue.
servererror.desc: Something went wrong on our end. This may be due to high traffic, a server glitch, or maintenance. Please try again shortly, or return to our home page to continue browsing.

notFound.subtitle: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you were looking for.
notFound.desc: It may have been removed, changed, or is temporarily unavailable. Please return to our homepage to continue browsing or discover other content.

b2bpage.title: Try your logo on our products
b2bpage.subtitle: Upload your company logo and instantly see how it will look on premium gifts — clutches, bags, business card holders, and more.

clutch.title: Clutch
clutch.desc: Want to see how your logo will look on a clutch? Upload your logo image and try it right now!

bag.title: Bag
bag.desc: Imagine how a bag with your brand's logo will look. Want to see the result? Try it right now!

watch.title: Watch
watch.desc: We even place your brand's logo on the inside of wristwatches — it's a delicate and precise job. Be sure to try it!
